news.title: A Cambodian said Moodeng, the hippopotamus that comes from Cambodia
news.shortDetail: A viral post claims Thailand's famous hippo Moodeng is actually from Cambodia.
news.fullDetail: A satirical social media post claims Moodeng, the beloved hippo at Khao Kheow Zoo in Thailand, was born in Cambodia and swam across the border. The post jokingly cites her love of watermelons as 'proof'. Thai fans have launched #MoodengIsThai, while Cambodian netizens humorously claim her as a national treasure. Zoo officials confirm she was born in captivity in Thailand.

news.title: Trump Administration Weighs 10% Stake in Intel
news.shortDetail: Trump may take a 10% stake in Intel using CHIPS Act funds.
news.fullDetail: The Trump administration is reportedly considering converting CHIPS Act grants into a 10% equity stake in Intel. This bold move would mark direct government ownership in a major U.S. chipmaker to strengthen domestic semiconductor production. The news caused Intelâ€™s stock to drop 3.8% as investors reacted to potential government influence.

news.title: Japanâ€™s Tokara Islands Hit by Over 900 Earthquakes in Two Weeks
news.shortDetail: Over 900 quakes rattle Japanâ€™s Tokara Islands in two weeks.
news.fullDetail: Japanâ€™s remote Tokara Islands experienced over 900 earthquakes in two weeks, with the strongest reaching magnitude 5.5. No major damage reported, but residents report constant shaking and sleep deprivation. The Japan Meteorological Agency warns of possible stronger quakes and urges preparedness for evacuation.

news.title: Elon Musk Suddenly Gives Away 1 Million BTC, Twitter Melts Down
news.shortDetail: A fake tweet claims Elon Musk is giving away 1 million BTC.
news.fullDetail: A fake tweet said Elon Musk would give away 1M BTC. It went viral but was quickly debunked as a scam joke.

news.title: AI Officially Declares War on Software Engineersâ€”Jobs to Be Fully Replaced by September
news.shortDetail: A satirical AI announcement claims devs will be replaced by September.
news.fullDetail: A parody claims AI will replace all software engineers by Sep 2025, sparking memes like #EspressoEngineers.

news.title: Tokyo Stocks Hit Record Highs for the Third Time in a Week
news.shortDetail: Nikkei 225 hits record high amid global economic optimism.
news.fullDetail: Japanâ€™s Nikkei 225 reached 43,714.31 on Aug 18, the third record in five days, boosted by optimism and U.S. rate cut hopes.

news.title: Women's World Championship Pool Previews: Pool A
news.shortDetail: Thailand hosts Pool A of the 2025 Women's Volleyball World Championship.
news.fullDetail: The 2025 Volleyball World Championship starts in Bangkok with Pool A: Thailand, Netherlands, Sweden, Egypt.

news.title: Muzan Secretly Survives the Demon Slayer Finale
news.shortDetail: Shocking fan rumors claim Muzan Kibutsuji faked his defeat and is still alive, plotting his next karaoke night instead of world domination.
news.fullDetail: Fan jokes say Muzan survived and is planning karaoke instead of world domination.

news.title: Valorant Upgrades to Unreal Engine 5 This Summer
news.shortDetail: Riot Games will transition Valorant from Unreal Engine 4 to Unreal Engine 5 in July 2025, aiming for better performance and faster downloads.
news.fullDetail: Riot Games will shift Valorant to Unreal Engine 5 in July 2025 for smoother performance and faster downloads.
